Whats in the box?

1.
BilderBox - center of the Bilder system, containing storage and hardware
2.
BilderBook - view curated photo collections in this beautiful digital album
3.
BilderScan - the most convenient way to scan your prints and albums
4.
BilderBeam - enjoy your photos the old-fashioned way in a slideshow
5.
Film strip rack - scan 35mm negatives and slides with BilderBox
6.
Power adapter, manuals, cleaning cloth
